Plot: When an alcoholic relapses, causing him to lose his wife and his job, he holds a yard sale on his front lawn in an attempt to start over. A new neighbor might be the key to his return to form.
Title: Everything Must Go
Writer: Dan Rush, Raymond Carver (short story "Why Don't You Dance")
Actors: Will Ferrell, Christopher Jordan Wallace, Rebecca Hall, Michael Peña
tomatoConsensus: It may not improve on the Raymond Carver short story that inspired it, but Everything Must Go resists cliche and boasts a pair of magnetic performances from the perfectly cast Ferrell and Wallace.
